teaser: Millions of Americans have had credit card and debit card information stolen by hackers at big retailers like Target and Neiman Marcus. Marketplace Money host Carmen Wong Ulrich talks to consumer advocate Bob Sullivan about what we can do to keep our money safe.
description: Millions of Americans have had credit card and debit card information stolen by hackers at big retailers like Target and Neiman Marcus. Marketplace Money host Carmen Wong Ulrich talks to consumer advocate Bob Sullivan about what we can do to keep our money safe.
contentencoded:
Millions of Americans have had credit card and debit card information stolen by hackers at big retailers like Target and Neiman Marcus.

Bob Sullivan, consumer advocate and investigative journalist at BobSullivan.net, says “this is going to be the most important credit card hack ever.”

Need more advice? Sullivan wrote more tips about protecting yourself on his website.
title: Worried about Target? The do's and don'ts of protecting your data
